records.Name: Dandelion Small Batch Chocolate
records.Description: Experience the buzz around San Francisco's newest boutique chocolatier. These beans are slow roasted whole for unparalleled flavor depth.

records.Name: Dandelion Assortment
records.Description: Bring the flavor of San Francisco boutique chocolate into your home, or present as a gift to the foodie in your life.

records.Name: Caramelized Almonds
records.Description: Addictive treats from the popular new boutique chocolatier in San Francisco's Mission District.

records.Name: Matzo Crunch
records.Description: A uniquely crunchy treat. So good we had to offer it all year round.

records.Name: Patric Mizzou Crunch
records.Description: Some love smooth, some love crunch. This is a crunch! Lively on the palette.

records.Name: Patric IN-NIB-ITABLE
records.Description: For the Nibs lovers in your life: a bar of 72% cacao, dark;y sweet and strewn with crunchy nibs.

records.Name: Patric Limited Edition
records.Description: Salt and chocolate meet in a single bar. For sophisticated palettes.

records.Name: Ritual Nib Bar
records.Description: The finest of Colorado craft chocolatiers produces a memorable nibs bar.

records.Name: Ritual Assortment
records.Description: This assortment of bars from Colorado's best craft chocolatier is a chocolate education in a box. A fabulous gift.

records.Name: Rogue
records.Description: Rogue: a labor of love from a true iconoclast. Taste the confection Bon Appetit named "Chocolate of the Year."

records.Name: Soma Assortment
records.Description: Rainforest flavors like Green Tangerine pair with cacao for an unusually tropical flavor experience.

records.Name: Tcho
records.Description: Tcho! A delightful mixed assortment from the artisanal chocolate factory by the Bay.

records.Name: Xocolatl De David
records.Description: Mexican heritage chocolate, complete with a hint of heat and cinnamon.

records.Name: Chocolat Milkaaaaa
records.Description: Et la marmotte elle met le chocolat dans le papier d'alu!

records.Name: IMMORTELLE DIVINE CREAM
records.Description: Divine Cream is complete face moisturiser that fights against visible signs of ageing: wrinkles, loss of firmness, radiance and uneven skin tone.

records.Name: LUXURY SIZE ALMOND SHOWER OIL
records.Description:
A unique oily texture that leaves the skin delightfully perfumed.
Luxury Size Almond Shower Oil 500 ml

records.Name: PRECIOUS CREAM
records.Description: The Precious Cream helps to restore firmness of the skin.

records.Name: PIVOINE SUBLIME PERFECTING CREAM
records.Description: Helps hydrate and beautify skin with our patented PIVOINE SUBLIME complex.
